text: Le Bossu (The Hunchback) is a French historical adventure novel by Paul Féval. It was first published in short sections in Paris in 1858. The story happens in France in two different times, 1717 and 1899. Some real events are in the novel. It also includes real historical characters such as Philippe II, Duke of Orléans. Category:Historical novels Category:French novels Category:1858 books
title: Le Bossu
